name: In re ESTATE of Robert L. LOWRY, Deceased. Appeal of John R. LOWRY et al.

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Robert L. LOWRY, Deceased. Appeal of John R. LOWRY et al.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John D. Rively, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Francis J. O’Gorman, Jr., Heath L. Allen, Harrisburg, for appellee Robert Griffin.
Gerald T. Sajer, New Cumberland, for appellee CCNB Bank, N. A.
Samuel L. Andes, Lemoyne, for appellee Jacqueline Sener.
casebody.head_matter:
415 A.2d 697
In re ESTATE of Robert L. LOWRY, Deceased. Appeal of John R. LOWRY et al.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 23, 1980.
Decided June 18, 1980.
John D. Rively, Harrisburg, for appellants.
Francis J. O’Gorman, Jr., Heath L. Allen, Harrisburg, for appellee Robert Griffin.
Gerald T. Sajer, New Cumberland, for appellee CCNB Bank, N. A.
Samuel L. Andes, Lemoyne, for appellee Jacqueline Sener.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
